duties_responsibilities.duty: Screen and evaluate medical intake calls to provide appropriate services or referrals.
Schedule initial appointments for new clients and assist in completing required forms and collecting client data.
Obtain and verify insurance coverage to ensure proper claim submission and reimbursement.
Monitor and report referral and intake patterns as needed.
Act as a liaison for insurance, DCF, and other outside companies or funding sources regarding referrals and reimbursement issues.

education_certification.credential: Associate's degree (A. A.) or equivalent combination of education and experience.
Bilingual candidates strongly encouraged to apply.
Three to five years related experience and/or training.
All employees at UCFS are required to be vaccinated against COVID-19.
